measured_by: 5-point self-rating scale (extremely knowledgeable … not knowledgeable at all)
justification: “They then rated their knowledge of NFL football on a 5-point scale: extremely knowledgeable, very knowledgeable, moderately knowledgeable, slightly knowledgeable, and not knowledgeable at all.”

measured_by: 5-point confidence rating scale (guess … very high confidence)
justification: “Then they rated their confidence in this prediction on a 5-point scale: guess, low confidence, moderate confidence, high confidence, and very high confidence.”

“Finally, participants estimated the percentage of others they believed would agree with their prediction. This percentage estimation was done with a slider that showed the exact whole number from 0 to 100 being selected as the slider was moved.”
